name: Kuhl Trekr 11" Shorts - Women's
description: Trek up a peak, around a lake or through the forest. The stretchy and soft fabric of the Trekr shorts is comfy all day long. Need extra carrying capacity? Two low-profile side pockets add storage without bulk.Made from stretchy REKOIL fabric that feels soft.Internal drawcord and belt loops give you options for fine-tuning the fit.2 front pockets, 2 back pockets, and 2 hidden side zippered pockets for on-the-go storage.KÜHLKURVE™ feminine fit.
